column4: Is there anyway to save login information when using openssh-server, or do I have to type the server name in everytime I connect?
to avoid typing in the server name, look in man ssh_config
you'd make a host block named with a shortcut name, then set HostName to the actual name
and if you need to save passwords too, look up ssh-keygen as Yahovah said
